post.author: 황성규
post.content: The system's master environment block is normally owned by the shell COMMAND.COM. COMMAND.COM creates this set of environment strings in memory from the contents of the AUTOEXEC.BAT file, using the SET, PATH, and PROMPT commands. The initial size of COMMAND.COM's environment block can be controlled by loading COMMAND.COM with the /E parameter, using the SHELL directive in CONFIG.SYS. For example: SHELL=COMMAND.COM /E:2048 /P This line in CONFIG.SYS sets the initial size of COMMAND.COM's environment to 2K. The maximum size the environment can be set to is 32K; the default size is 160 bytes. (The /P option prevents COMMAND.COM from terminating, keeping it in memory until the system is restarted.) For more information, http://support.microsoft.com/support/kb/articles/Q69/8/46.ASP 이홍식 wrote: > 이런 에러문구가 발생하여 Visual Age를 돌릴 수 없었습니다. > > "매개변수가 너무 많습니다. 환경변수 저장공간이 부족합니다." > > 어떻게 해야 에러를 해결하고 VA를 사용할 수 있을까요? > 도움주시면 감사하게습니다.
post.title: RE: IBM Visual Age for Java installation on win98
